__e: He would perceive that time is like a freeway with an infinite number of lanes, all leading from the past into the future, however, not into the same future.
It is a symbol of God's unending love for his people... and of the union between Christ and His church.

When I first started trying out those ideas, it was really difficult to go all the way from infinity to such a small thing, just a little bit larger -- just 20% larger than what we see around us today.
I knew atlast that love is endless and today's little happiness only part of it.
You tell her that your love for her is timeless, and that you would be honored to have her hand in marriage.
When they say "above and beyond" this is what they're talking about... the shit you did to protect those girls.
